about.title: About Stronwell
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Professional Equipment
about.description: Stronwell specializes in providing high-quality professional equipment solutions to businesses across Latin America and beyond.
about.storyContent: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between premium quality and affordability, Stronwell has become a trusted name in the professional equipment industry.
about.missionContent: To empower businesses with reliable, professional-grade equipment that enhances productivity and drives growth.
about.visionContent: To be the leading supplier of professional equipment solutions in emerging markets worldwide.
about.qualityDesc: All our products meet international quality standards
about.networkDesc: Extensive dealer network across Latin America
about.contactDesc: Have questions? Our team is here to help you find the right solutions for your business.

whereWeComeFrom.title: Where We Come From
whereWeComeFrom.para1: Stronwell was founded with a clear mission: to bridge the gap between premium quality and affordability in professional equipment markets.
whereWeComeFrom.para2: Recognizing the challenges faced by Latin American distributors—caught between overpriced premium brands and unreliable low-end imports—we set out to create a better alternative.
whereWeComeFrom.para3: Today, we serve hundreds of partners across multiple countries, providing them with trusted performance, solid margins, and the support they need to scale their businesses.

belief1.title: Quality Without Compromise
belief1.description: Every product we offer meets rigorous international standards, ensuring reliability and performance that your customers can trust.

belief2.title: Fair & Transparent Pricing
belief2.description: We believe in sustainable partnerships built on healthy margins that allow our dealers to grow profitable businesses.

belief3.title: Long-Term Partnerships
belief3.description: We're not just suppliers—we're committed partners invested in your success through comprehensive support and shared growth.

belief4.title: Market-Driven Innovation
belief4.description: We continuously adapt our offerings based on real feedback from our dealer network and end-users in local markets.

globalPresence.title: Our Global Presence
globalPresence.subtitle: Serving Markets Worldwide
globalPresence.para1: With a growing network of trusted dealers and distributors, Stronwell serves professional equipment markets across multiple continents.
globalPresence.para2: Our commitment to local partnerships ensures that businesses have access to quality products backed by reliable support, no matter where they operate.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have questions? We're here to help. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

partnerEdge.title: Partner Edge Program
partnerEdge.subtitle: Join Our Global Network
partnerEdge.subtitle2: Real Solutions for Real Importer Challenges
partnerEdge.description: Real Solutions for Real Importer Challenges
partnerEdge.fullDescription: Stronwell helps Latin American distributors break free from overpriced premium brands and unreliable low-end imports—offering trusted performance, solid margins, and scalable growth.
partnerEdge.benefit1Desc: Secure your market with protected territories
partnerEdge.benefit2Desc: Co-branded materials and digital marketing assistance
partnerEdge.benefit4Desc: Attractive pricing structure for sustainable growth

challenge1.title: Premium Brand Pricing
challenge1.description: Overpriced premium brands squeeze your margins and make it difficult to compete in price-sensitive markets.

challenge2.title: Unreliable Cheap Imports
challenge2.description: Low-quality products damage your reputation and lead to costly warranty claims and customer complaints.

challenge3.title: Limited Product Range
challenge3.description: Narrow product portfolios restrict your ability to serve diverse customer needs and grow market share.

challenge4.title: Inconsistent Supply
challenge4.description: Unpredictable stock availability and delivery times make inventory planning nearly impossible.

challenge5.title: Weak Technical Support
challenge5.description: Inadequate after-sales support leaves your team struggling to help customers with technical issues.

challenge6.title: No Marketing Materials
challenge6.description: Lack of professional marketing assets makes it harder to promote products and generate leads effectively.

challenge7.title: Complex Import Process
challenge7.description: Complicated customs procedures and documentation create delays and increase operational overhead.

challenge8.title: Currency Fluctuations
challenge8.description: Exchange rate volatility erodes margins and makes financial planning uncertain for your business.

challenge9.title: Minimum Order Quantities
challenge9.description: High MOQs tie up capital and warehouse space, limiting flexibility to test new products or markets.

challenge10.title: Competition from E-commerce
challenge10.description: Online retailers selling direct to consumers threaten your traditional distribution channel advantages.

challenge11.title: Training & Education
challenge11.description: Insufficient product training for your sales team results in missed opportunities and poor customer experiences.

challenge12.title: Payment Terms
challenge12.description: Rigid payment conditions strain cash flow and make it difficult to manage working capital effectively.

step1.title: Submit Your Application
step1.description: Fill out our partnership form with details about your business, market, and distribution capabilities.

step2.title: Application Review
step2.description: Our partnership team evaluates your application and assesses market fit within 48-72 hours.

step3.title: Partnership Agreement
step3.description: We discuss terms, territory rights, pricing structure, and finalize the partnership contract together.

step4.title: Onboarding & Training
step4.description: Access comprehensive product training, marketing materials, and technical resources to get started.

step5.title: Launch & Grow
step5.description: Begin selling with full support from our team—ongoing assistance helps you scale your business.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Distribution Business?
cta.subtitle: Join successful partners who've already made the switch to reliable margins and sustainable growth.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Learn about how we use cookies to improve your browsing experience
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Stronwell uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you when you visit our website.
cookies.understandingIntro: At Stronwell Machines, we use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and provide personalized content. This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are, how we use them, and how you can control them.
cookies.questionsText: Our team is here to help you understand how we use cookies and manage your preferences.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Learn how we protect your personal information
privacy.intro: At Stronwell, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information.
privacy.commitmentPara1: At Stronwell Machines, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect information about you when you use our website, products, and services.
privacy.commitmentPara2: We believe in transparency and want you to understand your rights regarding your personal data. This policy applies to all information collected through our website, mobile applications, and other digital services.
privacy.questionsText: Our privacy team is here to help you understand how we protect your data and exercise your rights.
privacy.privacyMattersText: We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of data protection and privacy. If you have any concerns about how your information is handled, please don't hesitate to contact us.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms carefully before using our services
terms.introPara1: Welcome to Stronwell Machines. These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website, products, and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.introPara2: Stronwell Machines is committed to providing high-quality machinery and equipment while maintaining transparent and fair business practices. These terms help ensure a positive experience for all our customers and partners.
terms.questionsText: Our legal team is available to clarify any questions you may have about these terms and conditions.
terms.importantNoticeText: These terms and conditions constitute the entire agreement between you and Stronwell Machines. By continuing to use our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our website and services.

footer.description: Empowering professionals with premium tools and equipment. Building the future of industrial excellence through innovation and quality.

about.title: About Stronwell
about.subtitle: Pioneering excellence in industrial solutions for over two decades, we've been the trusted partner for businesses worldwide.
about.story1: Founded with a vision to revolutionize the industrial equipment landscape, Stronwell has grown from a small workshop to a global leader in manufacturing high-quality tools and machinery.
about.story2: Our journey began with a simple belief: that every professional deserves access to reliable, innovative equipment that enhances their productivity and drives their success. This philosophy continues to guide us today.
about.story3: Through continuous innovation, strategic partnerships, and an unwavering commitment to quality, we've built a reputation that spans continents and serves diverse industries worldwide.
about.missionText: To empower businesses and professionals with innovative, reliable, and sustainable industrial solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and success in an ever-evolving marketplace.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that drive our success and guide our relationships with customers, partners, and communities.
about.innovationDesc: Constantly pushing boundaries with cutting-edge technology and forward-thinking solutions.
about.qualityDesc: Uncompromising commitment to excellence in every product we manufacture and deliver.
about.reliabilityDesc: Building trust through consistent performance for our customers.
about.sustainabilityDesc: Creating environmentally responsible products that contribute to a better future.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our products, services, and partnerships. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.
faqs.q1: What types of industrial equipment does Stronwell manufacture?
faqs.a1: Stronwell specializes in a comprehensive range of industrial equipment including agricultural machinery, power tools, garden equipment, marine motors, cleaning systems, generators, and construction tools. Our product portfolio spans over 500 different models designed for professional and commercial use.
faqs.q2: Do you offer warranty on your products?
faqs.a2: Yes, all Stronwell products come with comprehensive warranty coverage. Our standard warranty ranges from 1-3 years depending on the product category. We also offer extended warranty options and comprehensive after-sales support through our global service network.
faqs.q3: How can I become a distributor for Stronwell products?
faqs.a3: We welcome partnership opportunities with qualified distributors worldwide. To become a Stronwell distributor, you'll need to meet certain criteria including market presence, technical expertise, and service capabilities. Please contact our partnership team through our
faqs.a3End: page for detailed requirements and application process.
faqs.q4: Do you provide international shipping and support?
faqs.a4: Yes, we serve customers in over 50 countries worldwide. We have established shipping partnerships and service networks globally to ensure timely delivery and local support. Our international team can assist with logistics, customs clearance, and provide technical support in multiple languages.
faqs.q5: How do I find the right product for my specific needs?
faqs.a5: Our expert team can help you select the perfect equipment for your requirements. You can browse our product categories online, use our product finder tool, or contact our technical consultants who will assess your needs and recommend the most suitable solutions. We also offer product demonstrations and trial programs for qualifying customers.
faqs.q6: What kind of technical support and training do you provide?
faqs.a6: We offer comprehensive technical support including installation guidance, operation training, maintenance workshops, and troubleshooting assistance. Our certified technicians provide on-site training, video tutorials, detailed manuals, and 24/7 technical helpline support to ensure optimal performance of your equipment.
faqs.ctaSubtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Stronwell for their industrial equipment needs.
